page.title: 10RECREATION SEAHOUSES
page.content: For the residents of Seahouses there are many opportunities for recreation in the village and others within easy reach. At the Community Centre there are Badminton, outdoor Bowls and Carpet Bowls clubs. At the Middle School there is a Youth Club and the Football Team use the pitch. In the winter the Night School offers a wide range of both educational and recreational activities. There is a fine 18 Hole Golf Course. The Bridge Club meets once a week in the Bamburgh Castle Hotel. Other activities available outside the village are: Cricket at Bamburgh,Rugby at Alnwick and a Parachute Club at Embleton.
